All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary Enum Summary 
    Class Description
    BasicTestClient
    A basic client that tests your model implementation.
    Bet
    Represents a bet in the Game Engine in Further Programming Assignment.
    BetType
    An enum in the Further Programming Assignment
    ColorBet
    Represents a color bet in the Game Engine in Further Programming Assignment
    ColorBetImpl
    Implementation of ColorBet that deals with color based bets.
    ConsoleLoggerCallback
    An implementation of GameCallback which uses a Logger to log game events to the console.
    GameCallback
    The callback interface in Further Programming Assignment
    GameCallbackCollection
    Provides methods for adding or removing a GameCallback from a collection.
    GameEngine
    The main interface in Further Programming Assignment.
    GameEngineImpl
    A concrete class implementing the main interface, Game Engine, in Further Programming Assignment.
    NumberBet
    Represents a number bet in the Game Engine in Further Programming Assignment
    NumberBetImpl
    Implementation of NumberBet that deals with slot number based bets.
    Player
    Represents a single player in the GameEngine in Further Programming Assignment.
    PlayerImpl
    Concrete class that represents a single player in the Game Engine in Further Programming Assignment.
    Slot
    Represents a slot in the Further Programming Assignment
    SlotColor
    An enum in the Further Programming Assignment
    SlotImpl
    A concrete class representing a slot by implementing the Slot interface.
    Validator
    Code Validator - not required to written by students!
    Wheel
    Represents a wheel in the Further Programming Assignment
    WheelImpl
    A concrete class representing a wheel of slots by implementing the Wheel interface.
